# Kraidyl Equipment
## Overview
***[[Kraidyl]]****** have access to the following equipment.***

The articles in this grouping comprise the new [[Kraidyl|kraidyl]] equipment introduced in *[[Underworld Races and Classes]]*. See the list of Governed Content on the right for a complete list of names and links.

---
## Governed Content
- [[Camouflage Grit]]
- [[Kraidyl Decoy]]
- [[Kraidyl Helmet]]
- [[Kraidyl War-Banner]]
- [[Severing Maw Trap]]
